Uncategorized: Grand Army of the Republic Training

Unknown: Grand Army of the Republic Training

general: Grand Army of the Republic Training

description.value: Gain bonuses on Perception checks when near allies.
Gain bonus Move Action when you catch your Second Wind.
When using a weapon set on Autofire, you can reduce the area to 1 square.
You can Charge without moving in a straight line.
Knock an opponent Prone when you use Bantha Rush.
Impose a penalty to Skill Checks for Mind-Affecting effects that target you.
Repair multiple Droids simultaneously.
You do not move down the Condition Track the first time an attack exceeds your Damage Threshold.
Gain a bonus to Fortitude Defense when an enemy fails to affect you.
Dodge two targets, Withdraw at full Speed.
Deal +1 die of damage with Simple Weapons (Melee).
Increases attack bonus, with penalties to Reflex Defense.
+1 bonus on ranged attacks and damage against foes within Point-Blank Range.
Catch a Second Wind as a Free Action on your turn.
Gain Bonus Hit Points whenever you take down a foe.
Gain a bonus to Fortitude Defense against Atmospheric Hazards.
Maintain Pin feat and make subsequent Grapple checks as a Swift Action. Apply Crush to each check.
Gain a +5 bonus to resist Grab and Grapple attacks.
Gain a +5 bonus to Fortitude Defense and Will Defense against any effect requiring a Use the Force check.
Reroll Strength and Constitution based Skill Checks.
Take a -5 penalty on an Autofire attack to gain +2 dice of damage.
Gain a +1 bonus on your attack roll and deal +1 die of damage when making a ranged attack against an adjacent target or a target in your Fighting Space.
Gain bonuses on Ride checks when near allies.
Gain +1 Hit Point per Character Level.
Strike two targets in direct line of sight, dealing half damage to each.
Gain bonuses on Climb checks when near allies.
React twice to the same trigger once per encounter.
Gain a Force Point when you successfully Learn Secret Information.
Instead of Raging, gain +5 to Will Defense.
Gain +5 competence bonus on Skill Checks with one Trained Skill.
Once per encounter, make a Full Attack as a Standard Action.
Use basic Survival skills as if you have a Medpac for Treat Injury checks.
Gain bonuses on Mechanics checks when near allies.
Grant yourself +2 to the Defense of your choice for 1 round.
Impose penalties to enemy Skill Checks with a successful attack.
Use your Bellow ability without moving down the Condition Track.
Gain bonus hit points on Unarmed attacks. Deny target Equipment bonus.
Gain bonuses on Treat Injury checks when near allies.
Deal extra damage against Flat-Footed enemy. Render target Mute.
Learn a number of Force Regimens equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier (minimum of 1).
Your martial ability makes it harder for opponents to Tumble past.
Wield an Exotic Weapon without penalty.
Escape Grapple and attack.
Negate one attack per round against the Vehicle you're piloting.
Take additional Hit Point damage instead of moving down the Condition Track.
Draw and fire as a Standard Action.
Gain +2 to attack rolls and damage rolls with nonweapon Appendages in exchange for a -2 penalty to Reflex Defense.
Recover quickly after being moved down the Condition Track by damage.
Grant a bonus to allies' Fortitude Defense by foraging.
Take Swift Actions, Reactions, and Free Actions after you Charge before your turn ends.
Gain benefits when using certain Rifles.
Increase the die type when adding Force Points to a Perception check.
Use Dexterity modifier instead of Strength modifier on attack rolls with Light Melee Weapons and Lightsabers.
Use Dexterity or Intelligence to determine Reflex Defense.
Make a Deception check to move through a Threatened Area without provoking Attacks of Opportunity.
Temporarily gain access to an additional Talent.
You are inherently more resistant to Poison.
Jump for Cover as a Reaction.
Gain additional benefits from Cover.
Gain Bonus Hit Points when you Recover.
When Charging, turn any natural attack roll of 17+ into a Critical Hit.
Make Attack of Opportunity and move 1 square.
Deception check to push opponent away.
Use Knowledge (Bureaucracy) in place of Gather Information.
When behind Cover, you can reduce the damage of an incoming attack.
Catastrophic Failures in a Skill Challenge occur less frequently, and with milder results.
Shapeshift to impersonate a specific person.
Marked as Sith, your appearance inspires awe, dread, and fear in all who view it.
Delay the damage caused to a Vehicle until the end of the round.
Gain Bonus Hit Points when Raging.
Spend two Swift Actions to move +1 step along the Condition Track.
Gain a bonus on attack rolls after missing a target.
Install two Traits.
Extra melee attack after dropping target.
Enemies must roll twice, keeping the lower result, on Mind-Affecting effects.
Gain a bonus to Reflex Defense when you remain mobile.
Push foes away a number of squares equal to Strength modifier.
Make an extra attack with chosen weapon during Full Attack, -5 penalty to all attacks.
Gain a bonus to damage rolls against those who harm your allies.
You are trained to make use of Starship Maneuvers and are skilled at space combat.
Always have a Move Action during the Surprise Round.
Trade attack bonus on melee attacks for a dodge bonus to Reflex Defense.
Make Mechanics and Use Computer checks quickly.
Deal triple damage on a Critical Hit.
Throw a Grappled opponent up to 1 square beyond your reach and deal damage.
Trade attack bonus for damage on melee attacks (up to your Base Attack Bonus).
Swap one Trait for another Trait.
Gain +2 competence bonus on next attack against opponent you Tumble past.
Gain a bonus to Use Computer checks made to Astrogate.
Deal damage to adjacent targets when you damage objects and Vehicles.
You can make custom modifications to Armor, Weapons, Vehicles, Droids, and Devices.
Intimidate your enemies when Charging, preventing adjacent characters from making Attacks of Opportunity and denying your target its Dexterity bonus.
Move only -1 step on Condition Track when Ion damage exceeds Damage Threshold.
Draw weapon as a Swift Action.
You dive for Cover when you avoid Area Attacks.
Gain a +1 dodge bonus to Reflex Defense against a selected target.
Gain a bonus to Attacks of Opportunity with ranged weapons.
Increase the range of your Scent ability by 20 squares.
Gain a +1 bonus on an attack roll while adjacent to an ally.
Move 1 step down Condition Track to reduce damage.
Move target -1 step on the Condition Track when you hit with Aiming Accuracy.
Gain additional Hit Points when catching a Second Wind.
Through focus and raw determination, you can make multiple attacks even after moving.
Gain extra attack upon hitting the first target.
Move before and after making an attack.
Move 2 or more squares and gain a +1 bonus on attacks with Thrown Weapons until the end of your turn.
Gain an additional Second Wind per day.
Automatically Aid Another when using Autofire attacks.
Sacrifice Attack of Opportunity to move at half speed.
When you take damage, nearby allies attack your attacker.
Upon debilitating an opponent, you can cause other opponents to lose heart.
Deal +1 die of damage on Unarmed, melee, or ranged attacks until the end of your next turn after hitting an enemy with two Unarmed, melee, or ranged attacks.
Gain three additional Force Points at each level.
Gain a +5 bonus to Will Defense against Deception and Persuasion checks.
Gain extra use of a 1/encounter Talent or Feat.
Gain bonuses on Swim checks when near allies.
You ignore Soft Cover when making a ranged attack.
Use Deception to aid your Stealth check to use Sleight of Hand; use Stealth to draw and palm a weapon simultaneously.
Allied Droids benefit from your beneficial Mind-Affecting effects.
Reroll Initiative checks, always keeping the better result.
Gain bonus Languages equal to 1 + your Intelligence modifier (minimum 1).
Move up the Condition Track when you catch a Second Wind.
Increases damage from Unarmed attacks by one die step; gain +1 bonus to Reflex Defense.
Gain extra attack on a second target upon damaging the first target.
Deal +2 damage to Droid enemies, or +4 when using an Ion Weapon.
Perform Surgery on multiple creatures simultaneously.
Once per day, gain Bonus Hit Points for a Vehicle you Pilot.
Deal +1 die of damage on Unarmed or melee attacks until the end of your next turn after hitting an enemy with two Unarmed or melee attacks.
Make one melee attack against each opponent within reach.
Reroll Survival checks in native environment.
Attack of Opportunity with concealed weapon to greater effect.
Regain one Force Power when you catch a Second Wind.
If you Aim, gain +1 bonus on the attack roll.
Ignore enemies' dodge and deflection bonus to Reflex Defense when making Area Attacks with a weapon set on Autofire.
Withdraw by clearing threatened squares in up to 2 squares of movement, move your Speed when using the Withdraw Action. Withdraw as a Reaction by spending a Force Point.
Withdraw faster.
Gain +2 or +5 to Will Defense when you Fight Defensively.
Gain +1 bonus on melee attack rolls when allies are adjacent.
Make second extra attack with chosen weapon during Full Attack, additional -5 penalty to all attacks.
Attempt to deny enemies within 6 squares their next Move Action, with a chance to make enemies Flat-Footed.
Gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls when using the Charging Fire feat.
Make an Intimidation check when you deal damage with an Attack of Opportunity.
Deal more damage on critical hits. Use Dodge against enemies.
Substitute a Knowledge (Social Sciences) or Knowledge (Galactic Lore) skill check for a Wisdom-related Skill Check.
Gather materials for building objects
Make counterattacks. Impose penalties to enemy attacks.
Redirect missed attacks against Soft Cover.
If you Aim, deal extra damage.
Improve your chances of success with Climb or Jump checks.
Gain +2 bonus on your ranged attack roll and deal +1 die of damage.
Reroll an attack made with a Vehicle Weapon.
Reroll Swim checks, always keeping the better result.
Spend a Force Point to reroll an attack and take the better result.
Gain additional Attacks of Opportunity.
Roll d8s instead of d6s when you spend a Force Point.

feats.name: Grand Army of the Republic Training

description.value: Apply your armor's Equipment bonus to your Will Defense.
Gain bonuses on Jump checks checks when near allies.
Hoist or toss an ally of your size or smaller up to 2 squares.
Thrown Razor Bugs and Thud Bugs return to your hand immediately.
Gain bonuses on Acrobatics checks when near allies.
Flat-Footed targets knocked Prone on Surprise Round.
Gain bonuses on Stealth checks when near allies.
No penalty on attacks and no Armor Check Penalty while wearing Light Armor.
Gain bonuses on Use Computer checks when near allies.
Install a Bio-Implant on a living being.
Deal Unarmed or Claw damage to a Pinned opponent.
When you have Cover against an enemy's ranged attacks, gain a +1 bonus on attack rolls against that enemy.
Negate one Mind-Affecting effect per encounter.
Any attempt to negate your attack takes a -5 penalty on the attack roll or Skill Check.
After aiming as a Full-Round Action, gain a +5 on next weapon attack.
You may make a single ranged attack as a Reaction to a ranged attack against you that misses.
You may Grab two opponents as a Standard Action.
Grab and Grapple as a larger creature. Grab after Charging.
Take a -5 penalty on attacks when attacking with two weapons, or both ends of a double weapon.
No penalty on attacks and no Armor Check Penalty while wearing Light Armor, Medium Armor, or Heavy Armor.
Gain benefits with certain slugthrowers and sporting weapons.
Reroll Pilot checks, always keeping the better result.
Knock an enemy Prone after a successful Attack of Opportunity, immediately end the target's remaining Actions when also exceeding its Damage Threshold.
No limit to Cleave attacks each round.
Spend Force Points even if it is not your turn.
Make an Endurance check to prevent falling to 0 Hit Points.
Deny target's Dexterity bonus to Reflex Defense when you are Prone and Aiming.
When you use the Cleave feat, each enemy within 6 squares and line of sight takes a penalty to Reflex Defense, Skill Checks, and attack rolls against you.
Reroll missed attack by taking a penalty to Reflex Defense.
Sacrifice Attack of Opportunity to reduce target's Reflex Defense by 2.
Add half your Dark Side Score to Use the Force checks to resist detection.
Gain +2 bonus on attack rolls against Flat-Footed enemies.
Intimidate a creature or change its Attitude as a Standard Action.
Make Survival checks to resist Extreme Heat and Extreme Cold.
Rage bonus to attacks and damage increases to +5.
Increases damage from Unarmed attacks by one die step; gain +1 bonus to Reflex Defense.
Move an enemy -1 step down the Condition Track when using the Crush feat.
Trade attack bonus for damage on ranged attacks (up to your Base Attack Bonus).
Gain benefits when using certain Ion weapons.
Take a -2 penalty on a ranged attack roll to deal +1 die of damage.
Increase accuracy at a -5 Reflex Defense penalty.
Take 10 on Skill Checks when rushed, Take 20 in half of the normal time.
Gain a bonus to Skill Checks on targets whose Attitude you have improved.
Automatic success with Aid Another action at Point-Blank Range.
Damage Threshold increases by 5 points.
Increases damage from Unarmed attacks by one die step; gain +1 bonus to Reflex Defense.
Move a target damaged by your attack.
Use Wisdom instead of Intelligence for Intelligence-based Skill Checks.
Whenever you resist a Fear or Mind-Affecting effect, you gain a temporary Force Point.
Add Strength bonus to ranged attack rolls.
Reduce Speed by up to 2 squares to increase dodge bonus to Reflex Defense.
Spend two Swift Actions to make Deception check to make enemy Flat-Footed.
Take 10 or Take 20 on one Strength check or related Skill Check per encounter.
Learn a number of Force Powers equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1).
Deal an additional 5 points of damage against one target within a successful Area Attack.
Double Strength bonus to damage rolls on this special melee attack.
Reduce one Defense bonus but increase another.
Add full Heroic Level to attacks against slower enemies.
Deal more damage with your Bellow attacks.
Catch a Second Wind even when not at or below half Hit Points.
Gain Concealment against a target you damage with a Burst or Splash weapon.
Add +1 point of damage for every 5 points rolled above the target's Reflex Defense, plus additional benefits when you exceed the target's Damage Threshold.
Grant an additional +2 bonus when using the Aid Another action.
Use your Will Defense to determine your Damage Threshold.
Use Strength or Constitution to determine Fortitude Defense.
Reduce the time and cost of Bribery attempts.
Install superior equipment upgrades.
Grant a +5 bonus to attack with a successful Aid Another attempt.
Trip an opponent that you've Grappled, knocking it Prone.
Make ranged attack at end of a Charge; take a -2 penalty to Reflex Defense.
Gain a bonus to Will Defense when using an Atlatl or Cesta.
You become Trained in one Class Skill.
Add +1 die of damage when successful on a Full Attack.
You are able to react to incoming attacks, using you Mount or Speeder Bike to absorb attacks against you.
Move opponents -1 step on the Condition Track when you deliver a Coup de Grace.
After a successful Persuasion check, gain a bonus to future Persuasion checks.
Reroll the lowest damage die when making a successful attack.
Repair a Droid in 10 minutes instead of 1 hour.
Increase Speed and avoid attacks when riding a Mount.
Make swift Unarmed attacks. Deal half damage on misses.
Treat target's Damage Threshold as lower.
Reduce the cost multiplier of goods bought on the Black Market.
Gain bonuses on Pilot checks checks when near allies.
Spend a Force Point to increase all Defenses by +2 for 1 round.
Install a Cybernetic Prosthesis onto a living being.
You can lay down a hail of blaster fire to pin your opponents.
You can weave, juke, and roll to avoid enemy fire in the thick of combat.
Gain a dodge bonus to Reflex Defense when using Running Attack.
Gain +5 to creating a Deceptive Appearance or a Forged Document, and reduce the penalty for rushing.
Deal +1 die of damage on ranged attacks until the end of your next turn after hitting an enemy with two ranged attacks.
Range penalties for Short-, Medium-, and Long-ranged attacks are reduced.
You can wield a long-handled weapon as a Double Weapon.
Gain bonuses on Endurance checks when near allies.
Treat Improvised Weapons as Simple Weapons, deal +1d6 points of damage.
Grant bonus to allies' Untrained Skill Checks with a particular Skill.
Give an enemy a -5 penalty on attack and damage rolls for one round after striking it in Unarmed combat.
Use Wisdom or Charisma to determine Will Defense.
Reroute Power more quickly and without the risk of failure.
Sacrifice Attack of Opportunity to reduce target's Reflex Defense by 5.
Unlocks Unleashed Abilities.
Regain more Hit Points (but more slowly) when you catch a Second Wind.
Increase Climb Speed, Swim Speed, and Jump distance by 2 squares.
Make custom modifications to Yuuzhan Vong Biotech.
Gain a temporary Force Point when your Perception reroll is lower.
Rage one additional time per day.
Ignore Cover with Grenades and grenadelike weapons.
You may knock two opponents' heads together after a successful Multi-Grab.
Enter Rage as a Free Action, and end Rage at will.
No -5 penalty for shooting into melee.
Grappled opponent is Pinned for one round, can't move, and and loses its Dexterity bonus to Reflex Defense.
Move a target damaged by your Grenade attack.
When Raging, use Skills that require patience at a -5 penalty.
+1 bonus on attack rolls with chosen weapon.
Allow an ally to deal more damage when you aid their attack.
Reroll Knowledge skill check, keeping the better result.
Take a -2 penalty on attacks when attacking with two weapons, or both ends of a double weapon.
Decrease penalty on Autofire attack and inflict extra damage when sustaining fire in the same squares in consecutive rounds.
Adjacent opponents can not use the Withdraw Action.
Cut all calculation time and Use Computer penalties by half when making Use Computer checks for Astrogation in the Hyperspace tangle. Reduce Hyperspace mapping time by half.
Trade -5 penalty on attack roll for +2 dice of damage when using a Light Melee Weapon.
Move Speed twice as Move Action.
Take a -2 penalty on a melee attack roll to deal +1 die of damage.
Reduce the target's Speed instead of dealing damage.
When a melee attack misses you, move into an adjacent square without provoking an Attack of Opportunity.
You don't move additional steps down the Condition Track due to your Implants.
Gain +5 bonus on melee attacks to Disarm an opponent.
You can spread your Aim action across multiple consecutive rounds.
You know how to put the weight of your momentum into attacks while riding a Mount or Speeder Bike.
Increase the die type when adding Force Points to a Survival check.
Reroll Perception checks, always keeping the better result.
Gain extra Force Powers when you take the Force Training Feat.
Gain a bonus to Will Defense when an enemy fails to overcome your iron will.
You become the leader of an Organization.
No penalty on attacks and no Armor Check Penalty while wearing Light Armor or Medium Armor.
Swap a Trained Skill for an Untrained Skill on the fly.
Automatically Recharge Shields in two Swift Actions.
Gain a +2 bonus to Fortitude Defense and Will Defense while Fighting Defensively.
Recharge Shields or Reroute Power on a Vehicle faster than normal.
Add your Charisma bonus to your Will Defense as a Reaction.
Gain a bonus to your Swim Speed.
Gain a bonus to your Rank and Privilege Score.
Increase critical threat range of an attack.
Gain benefits when using certain Pistols.
You are a master at using multiple starship tactics over the course of long space combats.
Gain bonuses on Survival checks when near allies.
Reroll a third failed Skill Check during a Skill Challenge, keeping the better result.
Gain a bonus to damage rolls when you spend a Force Point on a Bowcaster attack.
Spend two Swift Actions to deal extra damage in melee.
Gain a temporary Force Point when you roll a Natural 20 on a Pilot check.
You can make Use the Force checks and gain access to Force Talents.
Wield two-handed weapons in a single hand.
Gain a bonus to attack rolls when closer to your target than your allies.
Suppress opponents' insight and morale bonuses to Will Defense.
Add your Intelligence bonus to your Reflex Defense as a Reaction.
Reduce Black Market cost multiplier for Restricted Items by 1.
As a Reaction, make a Grab or Grapple attack following a failed Grab or Grapple attack made against you.
Trade Vehicle's Shield Rating for damage taken.
Gain Darkvision and ignore Total Concealment from darkness.
When using the Mounted Charge Action, attack enemies between you and your target.
Gain +2 bonus on your attack roll while Charging, and deal extra damage.
Gain Cover bonus equal to opponent's Cover bonus.
+2 Speed when making a Running Attack.
When unable to Withdraw, +2 on attacks.
You are trained to design (and redesign) Starships.
Share sensor data instantly with an ally.
Gain a +2 Species bonus to your Fortitude Defense.
Gain a +4 bonus on Strength checks and Strength-based Skill Checks.
Take no penalty on attacks when attacking with two weapons, or both ends of a double weapon.
Impose a penalty to Stealth checks made when close to you.
You automatically kill an enemy that you reduce to 0 Hit Points, and you can perform a Coup de Grace as a Standard Action.
Increase the die type when adding Force Points to a Deception check.
Ignore -5 penalty on attack rolls with weapons of a particular type.
Move damaged Grappled opponent -1 step on the Condition Track.
Deal damage with sharp claws on Unarmed attacks.
Treat a Skill Challenge as if it had the Recovery effect.
When you successfully Intimidate, enemy takes -5 to Skill Checks and -2 to attack for one round.
Move when you reduce an enemy to 0 Hit Points.
Gather Information with Perception skill, and do it faster.
In Unarmed combat, increase damage, and knock opponent Prone on Critical Hit.
Move when you catch a Second Wind.
Attack multiple targets as you move past them.
Attacks that would kill your enemy reduces them to 0 Hit Points instead.
+1 bonus to certain Skills and Defenses when dealing with a selected class of Droid.
Change your size.
Detect hidden enemies within 10 squares of you.
Gain a Climb Speed of 4 squares.
Gain +1 bonus to all Defenses.
Increase the die type when adding Force Points to attacks with an Atlatl or Cesta.
Increase the die type when adding Force Points to a Knowledge (Life Sciences) check.
You can perform Surgery in 10 minutes instead of 1 hour.
Catch more than one Second Wind in an encounter.
You increase the efficiency of your Burst and Splash weapon attacks.
Sweep a wide area while using Autofire mode.
Push opponent 1 square after making a successful melee attack.
Gain one temporary Force Point when targeted by an ally's Force Power or Force Talent.
Reroll Stealth checks, always keeping the better result.
Gain +5 dodge bonus to Reflex Defense against some Attacks of Opportunity.
